title: How to Make Cake Batter Pretzels

steps.headline: Prepare the cake mix according to the instructions on the package.
steps.description: Do not bake it yet. Preheat the oven to the temperature suggested.

steps.headline: Dip all the pretzel sticks in the batter.
steps.description: Be sure to not let them fall all the way in; just dip them enough to completely cover the pretzel sticks.

steps.headline: Place all the sticks together to make shapes.
steps.description: This is the fun part. You can make as many shapes as you want, and you can make any shape. Be sure to keep them all separate.

steps.headline: Once the oven is ready, place all the shapes on the cookie sheet and place in the oven.
steps.description: Be sure the cookie sheet is sprayed with cooking spray.

steps.headline: Prepare the frosting while waiting.
steps.description: If you got store bought frosting then just go watch TV or do something.

steps.headline: Put on an oven mitt and take out the cookie sheet when it is ready.
When they cool, put the frosting into a bowl.
steps.description: Dip each shape carefully in the frosting. Use a knife to make sure it is spread out neatly.

steps.headline: Serve!
steps.description: Put a fork in each shape or serve as is.

text: Prepare the cake mix according to the instructions on the package. Do not bake it yet. Preheat the oven to the temperature suggested. Dip all the pretzel sticks in the batter. Be sure to not let them fall all the way in; just dip them enough to completely cover the pretzel sticks. Place all the sticks together to make shapes. This is the fun part. You can make as many shapes as you want, and you can make any shape. Be sure to keep them all separate. Once the oven is ready, place all the shapes on the cookie sheet and place in the oven. Be sure the cookie sheet is sprayed with cooking spray. Prepare the frosting while waiting. If you got store bought frosting then just go watch TV or do something. Put on an oven mitt and take out the cookie sheet when it is ready. Wait until the shapes cool. When they cool, put the frosting into a bowl. Dip each shape carefully in the frosting. Use a knife to make sure it is spread out neatly. Sprinkle sprinkles over the pretzels.  Serve! Put a fork in each shape or serve as is.
